name: Tobacco In Out
query:
SELECT round(coalesce(max(OpeningBalance),0)*2.20462,2) AS "OpeningBalance:Data:150",
		round(coalesce(max(Purchase),0)*2.20462,2)as "Purchase:Data:120",
		round(coalesce(max(Sales),0)*2.20462,2) as "Sales:Data:120",
		round(coalesce(max(ClosingBalance),0)*2.20462,2) as "ClosingBalance:Data:150",
		round(coalesce((max(OpeningBalance) + max(Purchase) -max(Sales) - max(ClosingBalance)),0)*2.20462,2) as "Discripancy:Data:120"
from(
select sum(sle.actual_qty * TI.weight_per_unit) AS OpeningBalance,
			0 AS Purchase,
			0 AS Sales,
			0 AS ClosingBalance
		FROM `tabStock Ledger Entry` sle
		INNER JOIN `tabItem` AS TI 
		ON sle.item_code = TI.item_code
		and sle.warehouse = (select value from tabSingles where doctype = 'Stock Settings' and field='default_warehouse')
		WHERE posting_date < %(from_date)s
		AND TI.item_group in (select distinct name from `tabItem Group` where parent_item_group = 'TOBACCO')
		group by sle.stock_uom 	
UNION ALL 
select 
0 as OpeningBalance,
sum(round(coalesce(item.total_weight,0),2)) as Purchase,
0 as Sales,
0 as ClosingBalance
from `tabPurchase Receipt` si
left outer join (SELECT sum(total_weight)as total_weight, parent from (select CASE weight_uom
						WHEN 'Gram' then sum(total_weight/1000)
						ELSE sum(total_weight)
						END as total_weight,
						parent from `tabPurchase Receipt Item` 
						where item_group in (select distinct name from `tabItem Group` where parent_item_group = 'TOBACCO') group by parent,weight_uom) as t group by parent) item on item.parent=si.name
WHERE si.docstatus=1  
and si.name in (select distinct parent from `tabPurchase Receipt Item` where item_group in 
(select distinct name from `tabItem Group` where parent_item_group = 'TOBACCO'))
AND si.posting_date >= %(from_date)s and si.posting_date <= %(to_date)s
UNION ALL
select 
0 as OpeningBalance,
0 as Purchase,
(MAX(Sales)+ MAX(delivery))as Sales,
0 as ClosingBalance
FROM
( select  -- SALES INVOICE
sum(round(coalesce(item.total_weight,0),2)) as Sales,
0 as delivery
from `tabSales Invoice` si
left outer join (SELECT sum(total_weight)as total_weight, parent from (select CASE weight_uom
						WHEN 'Gram' then sum(total_weight/1000)
						ELSE sum(total_weight)
						END as total_weight,
						parent from `tabSales Invoice Item` 
						where item_group in (select distinct name from `tabItem Group` where parent_item_group = 'TOBACCO') group by parent,weight_uom) as t group by parent) item on item.parent=si.name
WHERE si.docstatus=1 and si.update_stock = 1
and si.name in (select distinct parent from `tabSales Invoice Item` where item_group in 
(select distinct name from `tabItem Group` where parent_item_group = 'TOBACCO'))
AND si.posting_date >= %(from_date)s and si.posting_date <= %(to_date)s
UNION ALL -- DELIVERY NOTE
select 
0 as Sales,
 sum(round(coalesce(item.total_weight,0),2)) as Delivery
from `tabDelivery Note` si
left outer join (SELECT sum(total_weight)as total_weight, parent from (select CASE weight_uom
						WHEN 'Gram' then sum(total_weight/1000)
						ELSE sum(total_weight)
						END as total_weight,
						parent from `tabDelivery Note Item` 
						where item_group in (select distinct name from `tabItem Group` where parent_item_group = 'TOBACCO') group by parent,weight_uom) as t group by parent) item on item.parent=si.name
WHERE si.docstatus=1 
and si.name in (select distinct parent from `tabDelivery Note Item` where item_group in 
(select distinct name from `tabItem Group` where parent_item_group = 'TOBACCO'))
AND si.posting_date >= %(from_date)s and si.posting_date <= %(to_date)s
) as D
UNION ALL
SELECT 	0 AS OpeningBalance,
		0 AS Purchase,
		0 AS Sales,		 
		sum(sle.actual_qty * TI.weight_per_unit) AS ClosingBalance
		FROM `tabStock Ledger Entry` sle
		INNER JOIN `tabItem` AS TI 
		ON sle.item_code = TI.item_code
		and sle.warehouse = (select value from tabSingles where doctype = 'Stock Settings' and field='default_warehouse')
		WHERE posting_date <= %(to_date)s
		AND TI.item_group in (select distinct name from `tabItem Group` where parent_item_group = 'TOBACCO')
		group by sle.stock_uom
	) as finaloutput
